item.title: Type safe records as an excuse to learn type level programming in Haskell
item.description: I've been recently trying to learn more advanced type-level constructs in Haskell and was very happy to find this amazing talk by Prof. Stephanie Weirich about Dependent Types in haskell. This talk helped me to understand deeper a few more recent concepts introduced by some of GHC's extensions and how to use them. In this post I want to focus a little bit in a simplified version of one of the data structures Prof.
